page.title: 10CATHERINE'S DAY (contd)
page.content: After break we have a one and a half hour lesson. At 12.15 the bell goes for lunch. I usually have a lunch-time activity, for example, sport. At 1.30 I go to my form room and my next hour lesson starts at 1.45 until 2.45. We have a 15 minute break until 3.00 and another hour lesson bringing us to the end of school. The bus takes my friend and I back home for 4.30 and I walk back to my house with my friend. After watching BBC1 television, I do my homework. If I need to concentrate hard I go to my room. I usually have an early dinner because I have dancing for 2 hours. When I come home I watch the television until 9.00. Then I go to the bathroom, have a bath if necessary and get ready for bed. I get my books ready for the next day and read until I go to sleep.
